title: The Christmas Episode with Byron Distinguido
itunes:title: The Christmas Episode with Byron Distinguido
description:
It’s beginning to look a lot like Christmas at The Cigar Authority and today we light up the Byron Distinguido as welcome Dave Burck from Cigar Jukebox to the show.

Are you tired of Christmas songs yet? We will debate what the best and worst Christmas songs are and I think it is safe to assume none of us will be in agreement.

We will unveil our letters to Santa Clause and tell you what we hope to get for Christmas and what the top selling toys of 2016 are.

Join us for all the madness of The Christmas Authority, The Food Authority… The Cigar Authority!
